book.title: A Mortal Glamour
book.description: Storyline: Amidst the many calamities of the late 14th century something sinister is at work among the sisters of la Tres Saunte Annunciacion, a force the women and the men around them seem powerless to fight? What is overwhelming both the holy and the damned?
book.author: Chelsea Quinn Yarbro
